## OWebForm.assert() method

Make an assertions.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
assert(predicate: unknown, message: string, data?: Record<string, unknown>): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  predicate | unknown | The assertion predicate. |
|  message | string | The error message when the predicate is false. |
|  data | Record&lt;string, unknown&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The error data. |

<b>Returns:</b>

this
